comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview the attached design file in PDF.

Build number:
2.2.1.v20070719-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. new a report with sample data set from table OFFICES.
2. drag a label and input text to be less than a PDF page.
3. drag the table binding to the data set and add group on COUNTRY, delete 
   table detail,table footer and group footer.
4. insert a label both in table header and group header, make content in table 
   header and group header more than a PDF page, add borders to table headers 
   and group heade
5. set page break inside avoid to table header and group header, preview in PDF

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
- org.eclipse.birt.report.service.api.ReportServiceException: Error happened while running the report; nested exception is:
java.lang.NullPointerException
